title: Save up to 45% on BLUETTI power stations over Black Friday
content:
Cyclist
Save up to 45% on BLUETTI power stations over Black Friday

So much of our modern lives require electrical power, from powering our homes and the gadgets that fill them to connecting us to the world around us. Bluetti’s portable power stations are the perfect way to get the most out of your digital footprint, giving you the freedom to keep everything from electric blankets to personal devices fully charged while off the grid – perfect for extended camping trips or cycling holidays, and a real game-changer for remote workers.

And with up to 45% off its extensive range of power stations in the BLUETTI Black Friday sale up until 2nd December, it’s the perfect time to power up your portable charging game.

Why BLUETTI?

Over the past decade, there’s no question that the rise of smart, connected electronics have transformed our lives. From all-powerful smartphones to the latest breed of hugely capable electric bikes, not only has our use of electronics increased the sheer amount of power each of us uses individually, but we’re also increasingly looking for the convenience of being able to access that power whether at home, on holiday or working remotely.

So it’s no surprise BLUETTI’s remote power stations have become an industry-leader in meeting those needs. The company’s versatile power solutions range from portable units you can just about take along with you on bikepacking trips all the way up to beefy power stations with the capacity and sophistication to keep your creature comforts fully powered over a week-long luxury campervan trip. What they all have in common, however, is they are made with the same commitment to quality, efficiency and environmental responsibility that has been a hallmark of BLUETTI’s products from day one.

And that commitment doesn’t just cover its own product line. Through initiatives such as the LAAF (Lighting An African Family) program, BLUETTI is dedicated to bringing power to one million African families in off-grid areas. With this combined focus on innovation, customer needs and ethical environmental practices, BLUETTI has established itself as a trusted industry leader in over 110 countries and regions.

BLUETTI Black Friday deals

Whether you’re looking for the perfect gift for someone else or a portable power solution that you can rely on for years to come, BLUETTI’s Black Friday sale is the perfect time to pick up a great deal. We’ve already covered some of BLUETTI’s best-sellers, and here are a few more:

BLUETTI AC50B Portable Power Station

A smart, reliable and versatile power station perfect for camping excursions. It has a 448Wh capacity and a maximum 700W output – more than enough to charge or power multiple devices simultaneously. With the Power Lifting Mode you can even extend this to up to 1,000W, enough to power resistive appliances such as kettles. Despite its huge capability it weighs just 6.7kg, making it a no-brainer to meet all your power needs while off the grid.

• Buy the BLUETTI AC50B Portable Power Station for £299 (save £100)

BLUETTI AC180 Portable Power Station

The BLUETTI AC180 strikes the perfect balance between power and portability, and with a massive £350 discount during the BLUETTI Black Friday sale, it’s also an incredible deal. Its 1,152Wh capacity can be charged to 80% capacity in just 45 minutes, at which point it can output an impressive 1.8kW (or 2.7kW in Power Lifting Mode) across 11 output ports. Despite this, it has a modest 340 x 247 x 317mm footprint and weighs a manageable 16kg, with a handle built in to make it easier to carry around.

• Buy the BLUETTI AC180 Portable Power Station for £549 (save £350)

BLUETTI AC200L Expandable Power Station

For a portable power station with everything you could ever need and more, look no further than the BLUETTI AC200L. With class-leading charging speed, output power, quiet operation and energy efficiency, it provides a one-for-all solution to meet your daily electricity needs. The basic stats – 2,048Wh, 2.4kW AC output with 3.6kW Power Lifting Mode, 80% charging within 45 minutes – only scratch the surface of what this groundbreaking power station offers, and like most of BLUETTI’s power stations, it integrates seamlessly with the company’s other power solutions.

• Buy the BLUETTI AC200L Expandable Power Station for £1,399 (save £200)

BLUETTI B300K expansion battery

If you’re looking for a versatile expansion battery with all the power you need to keep all your personal gadgets topped up, look no further than the BLUETTI B300K. With a massive 2,764.8Wh capacity – good for 4,000+ life cycles – it’s ideal for keeping devices like smartphones, tablets or fans charged. You can stack multiple units together, or mix and match with other BLUETTI power stations to boost the power you have even further.

• Buy the BLUETTI B300K expansion battery for £1,099 (save £400)

Check out all of BLUETTI’s Black Friday deals here. And for an extra 5% off, use the exclusive code BLUETTIEM5 at checkout.

The post Save up to 45% on BLUETTI power stations over Black Friday appeared first on Cyclist.
author: Martin James
